quote: I am an ordinary sort of fellow, not braver than other people, but I hate to see a good man downed, and that long knife would not be the end of Scudder if I could play the game in his place.
quote_letters: I AM AN ORDINARY SORT OF FELLOW NOT BRAVER THAN OTHER PEOPLE BUT I HATE TO SEE A GOOD MAN DOWNED AND THAT LONG KNIFE WOULD NOT BE THE END OF SCUDDER IF I COULD PLAY THE GAME IN HIS PLACE
